intro: Abutilon fraseri var. parviflorum, commonly known as the narrowflower abutilon, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun to partial shade, making it suitable for garden cultivation. This variety is often grown for its ornamental value and ability to attract pollinators.
